content: 1 st before marker p1 sm k to last 3 lightly steam block the shawl to schematic dimensions pass a steam sts k1tbl k2 iron over the shawl without touching the surface repeat row 5-8 33 more times repeat row 5-6 once more 285 optional use the remaining yarn to make one pompom in each colour sts and attach them at three points of the shawl if you run out of yarn early or if you want to keep knitting further you can to establish how many stitches to cast on for the border no matter what size the body count the number of stitches up to your marker and divide by two then add one for the stitch count in this pattern as written this equates to 142/2 + 1 = 72 make sure to end with row 5- 6 cut c1 and c2 leave all sts on the needle garter border with your live stitches still on your needle return to the beginning of the rs row join c3 and insert your needle between the first and second stitch on the lh needle and using the cable cast-on method co 72 sts row 1 rs k to last c3 stitch sl2wyif row 2 ws k2tog k to end row 3 repeat row 1 row 4 k2tog k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 1 st decreased repeats row 1 - 4 until 3 c3 sts remain a e schematic b a 48 / 122 cm d b 21 / 53 5 cm c c 40 / 102 cm d 32 / 81 cm e 18 / 46 cm #gleeshawl page 2 - www espacetricot com - © espace tricot 2022 - for personal use only
